Driving Question
How can we create a successful co ee shop business using innovative technology, design, and nancial planning to ensure pro tability and customer satisfaction?
Objectives/Goals
By the end of this project, you will:
1. Use the product development template to de ne and document the purpose of a feasibility study for starting a business
2. Utilize Fusion 360 to design essential co ee machine components, such as heat distribution systems and water ow mechanisms.
3. Understand circuit design principles for automating water pumps and push-button systems in co ee machines. 4. Implement digital inputs/outputs and control logic for automating the water pumps using Arduino. 5. Design functional circuits using Arduino to control water pumps, ensuring they start/stop with appropriate inputs. 6. Understand the di erence between UI (User Interface) and UX (User Experience) design.
7. Explain how UI/UX principles in uence the usability and engagement of a mobile app in a co ee shop setting.
8. Use HTML to create the structure of a fully-functional co ee shop website, including sections like the homepage, menu, about page, and contact forms.
Your Challenge
By the end of this project, you’ll have:
Developed a complete business plan and feasibility study for a new co ee shop, analyzing market opportunities and nancial requirements.
Designed key components of a co ee machine using Fusion 360 and created an automated water pump system using Arduino.
Programmed Arduino circuits to control the co ee machine’s water ow with push-button functionality.
Created a mobile app or website to manage customer interactions and orders, applying UI/UX design principles for a smooth user experience. Presented your co ee shop plan and prototype to a panel, showcasing how your business can successfully operate with a combination of entrepreneurial strategy and technology.
Are you ready to build a co ee shop model that could become the next big thing in the food and beverage industry? Let’s get started!
